chicken: Try making Grilled Chicken with Lemon & Herbs 🍗! Marinate chicken with lemon, garlic, and herbs, then grill it.
pasta: How about a Creamy Alfredo Pasta 🍝? Cook pasta, make a creamy sauce with garlic and cheese, and mix it together.
rice: A delicious Chicken Fried Rice 🍛! Stir-fry chicken, veggies, and rice with soy sauce.
pizza: Make a homemade Margherita Pizza 🍕! Use fresh dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.
salad: Try a refreshing Caesar Salad 🥗! Mix lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
fish: You can prepare Grilled Salmon with Garlic Butter 🐟! Season salmon and grill it with butter and garlic.
